message: Interesting! All previous tries used to be compiled with an IDE and such. Didn't see much hope in them. An interactive/interpreted language is interesting (even if i'm not likely to use it for anything serious).
name: Hello world: meet قلب, a programming language based on Arabic script
caption: www.theverge.com
description: In the Arab world, aspiring programmers are faced with a unique kind of challenge: nearly every computer language, platform, and standard in history has been built around a Latin character set —...
